product_name: Continental Mountain King ProTection 29er Foldable Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: The Continental Mountain King ProTection 29er foldable tire offers a broad, aggressive tread and tubeless-ready performance for solid handling and traction. Tubeless-ready design has UST folding beads with a supple 4-ply, 240 tpi casing for enhanced longevity and an air-tight design. ProTection construction adds a layer of strong, rubber-coated nylon that spans the width of the tire, delivering robust puncture protection. Combined with sealant, ProTection models deliver low-pressure tubeless performance with improved damping, traction and rolling characteristics. Black Chili rubber compound offers an impressive level of long-lasting, grippy and fast-rolling performance. Aggressive tread pattern offers confident traction that handles rough and wet cross-country trails. Continental Mountain King ProTection 29er foldable tire fits 29er wheels and has a recommended pressure of 50 psi (max 65 psi).
short_description: The Continental Mountain King ProTection 29er foldable tire offers a broad, aggressive tread and tubeless-ready performance for solid handling and traction.
